trends: There have been 70 other sightings in Edmonton
There were no other sightings in Edmonton on or around April 22nd 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsI first thought it was a satellite, but it was bigger and moving much faster. I stood up to follow it with my eyes and watched it move in a curved path from NE to E then stop briefly, circle and proceed across previous path and head toward the SE in an irregular path where it went behind a tree and out of my field of vision. My eyes filled with tears and flowed down my cheeks. My mouth went dry. I couldn't even blink. After 35 years of looking into the sky for SOMETHING, I finally saw.
Summary: movement faster than satellite, multi-directional crossing back over previous path, stopping and changing direction
